verses.verse: Then I looked, <WH7200> and behold, <WH2009> in the expanse <WH7549> that was over <WH5921> the heads <WH7218> of the cherubim <WH3742> something like a sapphire <WH5601> stone, <WH68> in appearance <WH4758> resembling <WH1823> a throne, <WH3678> appeared <WH7200> above <WH5921> them.

And He spoke <WH559> to the man <WH376> clothed <WH3847> in linen <WH906> and said, <WH559> "Enter <WH935> between <WH996> the whirling <WH1534> wheels <WH1534> under <WH8478> the cherubim, <WH3742> and fill <WH4390> your hands <WH2651> with coals <WH1513> of fire <WH784> from between <WH996> the cherubim, <WH3742> and scatter <WH2236> [them] over <WH5921> the city. <WH5892>" And he entered <WH935> in my sight. <WH5869>

Now the cherubim <WH3742> were standing <WH5975> on the right <WH3225> side <WH3225> of the temple <WH1004> when the man <WH376> entered, <WH935> and the cloud <WH6051> filled <WH4390> the inner <WH6442> court. <WH2691>

Then the glory <WH9202> of the Lord <WH3068> went <WH7311> up from the cherub <WH3742> to the threshold <WH4670> of the temple, <WH1004> and the temple <WH1004> was filled <WH4390> with the cloud, <WH6051> and the court <WH2691> was filled <WH4390> with the brightness <WH5051> of the glory <WH9202> of the Lord. <WH3068>

Moreover, the sound <WH6963> of the wings <WH3671> of the cherubim <WH3742> was heard <WH8085> as far <WH5704> as the outer <WH2435> court, <WH2691> like the voice <WH6963> of God <WH410> Almighty <WH7706> when He speaks. <WH1696>

And it came <WH1961> about when He commanded <WH6680> the man <WH376> clothed <WH3847> in linen, <WH906> saying, <WH559> "Take <WH3947> fire <WH784> from between <WH996> the whirling <WH1534> wheels, <WH1534> from between <WH996> the cherubim, <WH3742>" he entered <WH935> and stood <WH5975> beside <WH681> a wheel. <WH212>

Then the cherub <WH3742> stretched <WH7971> out his hand <WH3027> from between <WH996> the cherubim <WH3742> to the fire <WH784> which <WH834> [was] between <WH996> the cherubim, <WH3742> took <WH5375> some and put <WH5414> it into the hands <WH2651> of the one clothed <WH3847> in linen, <WH906> who took <WH3947> [it] and went <WH3318> out.
And the cherubim <WH3742> appeared <WH7200> to have the form <WH8403> of a man's hand <WH3027> under <WH8478> their wings. <WH3671>

Then I looked, <WH7200> and behold, <WH2009> four <WH702> wheels <WH212> beside <WH681> the cherubim, <WH3742> one <WH259> wheel <WH212> beside <WH681> each <WH259> cherub; <WH3742> and the appearance <WH4758> of the wheels <WH212> [was] like the gleam <WH5869> of a Tarshish <WH8659> stone. <WH68>
And as for their appearance, <WH4758> all four <WH702> of them had the same <WH259> likeness, <WH1823> as if <WH834> one wheel <WH212> were within <WH8432> another wheel. <WH212>

When they moved, <WH1980> they went <WH1980> in [any of] their four <WH702> directions <WH7253> without <WH3808> turning <WH5437> as they went; <WH1980> but they followed <WH310> <WH1980> in the direction <WH4725> which <WH834> they faced, <WH6437> <WH7218> without <WH3808> turning <WH5437> as they went. <WH1980>

And their whole <WH3605> body, <WH1320> their backs, <WH1354> their hands, <WH3027> their wings, <WH3671> and the wheels <WH212> were full <WH4392> of eyes <WH5869> all <WH5439> around, <WH5439> the wheels <WH212> belonging to all four <WH702> of them.
The wheels <WH212> were called <WH7121> in my hearing, <WH241> the whirling <WH1534> wheels. <WH1534>

And each <WH259> one <WH259> had four <WH702> faces. <WH6440> The first <WH259> face <WH6440> [was] the face <WH6440> of a cherub, <WH3742> the second <WH8145> face <WH6440> [was] the face <WH6440> of a man, <WH120> the third <WH7992> the face <WH6440> of a lion, <WH9030> and the fourth <WH7243> the face <WH6440> of an eagle. <WH5404>
Then the cherubim <WH3742> rose <WH7426> up. They are the living <WH9130> beings <WH9130> that I saw <WH7200> by the river <WH5104> Chebar. <WH3529>

Now when the cherubim <WH3742> moved, <WH1980> the wheels <WH212> would go <WH1980> beside <WH681> them; also when the cherubim <WH3742> lifted <WH5375> up their wings <WH3671> to rise <WH7311> from the ground, <WH776> the wheels <WH212> would not turn <WH5437> from beside <WH681> them.

When the cherubim stood <WH5975> still, <WH5975> the wheels would stand <WH5975> still; <WH5975> and when they rose <WH7426> up, the wheels would rise <WH7311> with them; for the spirit <WH7307> of the living <WH9130> beings <WH9130> [was] in them.
Then the glory <WH9202> of the Lord <WH3068> departed <WH3318> from the threshold <WH4670> of the temple <WH1004> and stood <WH5975> over <WH5921> the cherubim. <WH3742>

When the cherubim <WH3742> departed, <WH3318> they lifted <WH5375> their wings <WH3671> and rose <WH7426> up from the earth <WH776> in my sight <WH5869> with the wheels <WH212> beside <WH5980> them; and they stood <WH5975> still <WH5975> at the entrance <WH6607> of the east <WH6931> gate <WH8179> of the Lord's house. <WH1004> And the glory <WH9202> of the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> hovered <WH4480> <WH4605> over <WH5921> them.

These <WH1931> are the living <WH9130> beings <WH9130> that I saw <WH7200> beneath <WH8478> the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> by the river <WH5104> Chebar; <WH3529> so I knew <WH3045> that they [were] cherubim. <WH3742>

Each <WH259> one <WH259> had four <WH702> faces <WH6440> and each <WH259> one <WH259> four <WH702> wings, <WH3671> and beneath <WH8478> their wings <WH3671> [was] the form <WH1823> of human <WH120> hands. <WH3027>

As for the likeness <WH1823> of their faces, <WH6440> they were the same <WH1992> faces <WH6440> whose <WH834> appearance <WH4758> I had seen <WH7200> by the river <WH5104> Chebar. <WH3529> Each <WH376> one <WH376> went <WH1980> straight <WH413> <WH5676> <WH6440> ahead. <WH6440>
